job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Levy Professionals is currently looking for DevOps Engineers with strong experience in Azure Cloud and Generative AI for one of the largest financial institutions in the Netherlands. You will be joining the bank to spearhead internal initiatives on Generative Artificial Intelligence and develop new innovative solutions. As part of the data and analytics domain you will collaborate with various data-centered teams and consultants on a daily basis in a large international and dynamic environment., As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for creating and maintained automated, scalable, and secure environments for deploying AI models and integrating them into Azure cloud solutions. Looking to future proof your CV and experience? This is THE opportunity for you.

   Your key responsibilities will include:

   -Automating deployment by building CI/CD pipelines,

   -Setting up the necessary cloud infrastructure by using Bicep (similar to terraform) to support AI workloads and that networking are configured optimally,

   -Using Azure AI services to not only develop new models and solutions but also to support code automation and script generation, predictive maintenance, incident analysis, anomaly detection, and more.
job_details.full_text:
DevOps Engineer

Levy Professionals is currently looking for DevOps Engineers with strong experience in Azure Cloud and Generative AI for one of the largest financial institutions in the Netherlands. You will be joining the bank to spearhead internal initiatives on Generative Artificial Intelligence and develop new innovative solutions. As part of the data and analytics domain you will collaborate with various data-centered teams and consultants on a daily basis in a large international and dynamic environment., As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for creating and maintained automated, scalable, and secure environments for deploying AI models and integrating them into Azure cloud solutions. Looking to future proof your CV and experience? This is THE opportunity for you.

   Your key responsibilities will include:

   -Automating deployment by building CI/CD pipelines,

   -Setting up the necessary cloud infrastructure by using Bicep (similar to terraform) to support AI workloads and that networking are configured optimally,

   -Using Azure AI services to not only develop new models and solutions but also to support code automation and script generation, predictive maintenance, incident analysis, anomaly detection, and more.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes spearheading internal initiatives on Generative AI, developing new innovative solutions using Azure AI services, and integrating AI models into Azure cloud solutions. Key responsibilities include automating deployment for AI models, setting up cloud infrastructure for AI workloads, and using Azure AI services for model development, code automation, and predictive tasks. This aligns strongly with the GenAI Engineer profile's focus on developing, fine-tuning, and deploying applications built on generative models and integrating them into production systems.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves creating and maintaining automated, scalable, and secure environments for deploying AI models and integrating them into Azure cloud solutions, which directly relates to Operations Engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: creating and maintained automated, scalable, and secure environments for deploying AI models and integrating them into Azure cloud solutions

job_tasks.justification: Building CI/CD pipelines is a core component of Operations Engineering (MLOps) for automating software and model deployment.
job_tasks.phrase: Automating deployment by building CI/CD pipelines

job_tasks.justification: Setting up cloud infrastructure using Bicep to support AI workloads and optimize networking falls under the umbrella of Operations Engineering, specifically infrastructure as code for AI environments.
job_tasks.phrase: Setting up the necessary cloud infrastructure by using Bicep (similar to terraform) to support AI workloads and that networking are configured optimally

job_tasks.justification: Using Azure AI services to develop new models and solutions, including tasks like code automation, script generation, predictive maintenance, incident analysis, and anomaly detection, directly involves the modeling aspect of AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Using Azure AI services to not only develop new models and solutions but also to support code automation and script generation, predictive maintenance, incident analysis, anomaly detection, and more.

job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI models into Azure cloud solutions implies software development tasks to make these models functional within a larger system.
job_tasks.phrase: integrating them into Azure cloud solutions

job_tasks.justification: Spearheading internal initiatives on Generative Artificial Intelligence and developing new innovative solutions indicates a need to understand business goals and translate them into AI-driven projects.
job_tasks.phrase: spearhead internal initiatives on Generative Artificial Intelligence and develop new innovative solutions

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate with various data-centered teams and consultants
Looking to future proof your CV and experience?
